refnamediv.refpurpose: Is used to update an attribute

refentry.refsect1:
&reftitle.parameters;
conn_handle
Connection handle.
oid
Oid of the instance that you want to update.
attr
Name of the attribute that you want to update.
value
New value that you want to assign to the attribute.
